title: Pfizer Bids To Buy AstraZeneca
teaser: U.S. pharmaceutical giant Pfizer has offered $100 billion to buy British-Swedish drug maker AstraZeneca.
contentencoded:
Financial Times Reporter Cardiff Garcia joins us to talk about the U.S. pharmaceutical giant Pfizer’s $100 billion offer to buy British-Swedish drug maker AstraZeneca.

Guest

  • Cardiff Garcia, reporter for the Financial Times blog FT Alphaville. He tweets @CardiffGarcia.
